title: Hot Virtual Keyboard 8.5.1 (MUST for full Windows 8 Tablet Gamin
description:
I have been looking almost a week for a keyboard that would work on transparent mode on full screen applications. Very customizable with a bunch of themes and layouts, perfect (and only?) solution for gaming on Windows 8/8.1 Tablets.
(Until Gestureworks Gamepad gets a crack!)

Enjoy!

Instructions:

Block internet access with hosts: 
127.0.0.1        hot-virtual-keyboard.com
